item.title: Trustpilot 因摩根士丹利评级上调而大涨，尽管有卖空者索赔
item.description: 上周五，摩根士丹利将 Trustpilot 的股票评级上调两档至 "增持"，一天后，美国做空机构 Grizzly Research 将矛头对准了这家全球点评平台，随后 Trustpilot 股价大涨 16%。【原文：Trustpilot shares surged 16% after Morgan Stanley upgraded the stock by two notches to "overweight" on Friday, a day after U.S. short seller Grizzly Research took aim at the global review platform.】

item.title: 苹果公司向 84 个国家的用户发送新一轮网络威胁通知
item.description: 苹果公司周五表示，该公司已向 84 个国家的用户发送了新一轮网络威胁通知，以保护用户免受监控威胁。【原文：Apple has sent a new round of cyber threat notifications to users in 84 countries, the company said on Friday of its latest efforts to insulate customers against surveillance threats.】

item.title: 中国直播中的头像和有影响力的人物帮助推动利洁时在新兴市场的增长
item.description: 影响者和人工智能生成的头像在中国的直播应用程序上销售从杜蕾斯安全套到Harpic洁厕剂等各种产品，推动了消费品公司利洁时在新兴市场的增长。【原文：Influencers and AI-generated avatars selling everything from Durex condoms to Harpic toilet cleaner on livestreaming apps in China are propelling emerging-market led growth for consumer goods company Reckitt .】

item.title: Meta 与新闻出版商达成多项人工智能协议
item.description: Meta 公司周五表示，已与《今日美国》、People Inc、CNN、福克斯新闻、The Daily Caller、Washington Examiner 和《世界报》等新闻出版商达成了多项商业人工智能数据协议。【原文：Meta has struck several commercial AI data agreements with news publishers including USA Today, People Inc, CNN, Fox News, The Daily Caller, Washington Examiner and Le Monde, the company said on Friday.】

item.title: 即时观看：Netflix 将以 720 亿美元收购华纳兄弟发现公司旗下工作室和流媒体部门
item.description: Netflix 已同意以 720 亿美元的价格收购华纳兄弟发现公司的电视和电影工作室以及流媒体部门，这笔交易将把好莱坞最珍贵、最古老的资产之一交给这家颠覆了媒体行业的流媒体先驱。【原文：Netflix has agreed to buy Warner Bros Discovery's TV and film studios and streaming division for $72 billion, a deal that would hand control of one of Hollywood's most prized and oldest assets to the streaming pioneer that has upended the media industry.】

item.title: 西南航空下调全年息税前盈利预期，因政府停摆影响预订量
item.description: 美国西南航空公司周五下调了 2025 年关键利润指标息税前盈利（EBIT）的预期，理由是最近政府停摆导致收入减少，以及燃油价格上涨的影响。【原文：Southwest Airlines cut its 2025 forecast for key profit metric EBIT on Friday, citing lower revenue due to the recent government shutdown and the impact from higher fuel prices.】

item.title: Cloudflare 在仪表板出现小故障后恢复服务
item.description: 上周五，加密货币交易交易所 Coinbase 和 Anthropic 人工智能聊天机器人 Claude AI 的访问受到轻微故障影响，Cloudflare 已恢复了受影响的软件服务。【原文：Cloudflare has restored impacted software services after a minor outage on Friday hampered access to crypto trading exchange Coinbase and Anthropic's artificial intelligence chatbot Claude AI.】

item.title: Netflix 将以 720 亿美元收购华纳兄弟发现公司旗下工作室和流媒体部门
item.description: 这笔交易将把好莱坞最珍贵、最古老的资产之一交给这家颠覆了媒体行业的流媒体先驱。【原文：The deal would hand control of one of Hollywood's most prized and oldest assets to the streaming pioneer that has upended the media industry.】

item.title: 日本经济大臣称 "具体货币政策手段 "由日本央行决定
item.description: 日本经济振兴大臣木内实周五呼吁央行在制定货币政策时与政府密切沟通，但并未表示反对近期加息。【原文：Japan's economic revitalisation minister, Minoru Kiuchi, called on the central bank to closely communicate with the government in setting monetary policy on Friday, but did not voice opposition to a near-term interest rate hike.】

item.title: 早间新闻：宏观预测的季节到了
item.description: 我们已经进入了今年的最后一个月，这意味着一件事：2026 年的市场展望。【原文：We've entered the final month of the year, and that means one thing: 2026 market outlooks.】

item.title: 交易员关注政府停摆以来首份关键通胀报告，华尔街期货走势低迷
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货持平或小幅上涨，因为华尔街正在等待一个久拖不决的通胀数据，该数据可能会影响美联储的货币政策路径。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were flat to slightly higher on Friday as Wall Street awaited a long-delayed inflation reading that could shape the Federal Reserve's monetary policy path.】

item.title: X 因违反内容规则被欧盟罚款 1.4 亿美元，TikTok 和解
item.description: 这是根据具有里程碑意义的立法实施的首次制裁，很可能会引起美国政府的愤怒。【原文：This is the first sanction under landmark legislation which will likely draw the U.S. government's ire.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称，美联储12月利率下调25个基点的呼声已被淹没
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）周五表示，在央行决策者发表鸽派言论后，该公司与摩根大通（J.P.Morgan）和美银全球研究公司（BofA Global Research）一样，目前预计美国联邦储备委员会（U.S. Federal Reserve）将在 12 月份降息四分之一个百分点。【原文：Morgan Stanley said on Friday it now expects the U.S. Federal Reserve to deliver a quarter-percentage point rate cut in December, joining peers J.P.Morgan and BofA Global Research, following dovish remarks from central bank policymakers.】

item.title: 调查显示瑞士企业计划海外投资抵消美国关税
item.description: 根据商业协会 economiesuisse 的一项研究，瑞士企业计划将部分业务和生产迁往国外，以应对美国关税的影响。【原文：Swiss companies plan to relocate some of their operations and production abroad to deal with the impact of U.S. tariffs, according to a study by business association economiesuisse.】

item.title: 机构负责人：欧洲必须防范美国在稀土领域的主导地位
item.description: 一个由欧盟资助的关键矿产机构的负责人说，欧洲终于采取了重大措施来建设其稀土产业，以对抗中国的主导地位，但该地区也需要提防被美国压倒。【原文：Europe has finally taken major steps to build up its rare earths sector to counter Chinese dominance, but the region also needs to guard against being overwhelmed by the United States, the head of an EU-funded agency for key minerals said.】

item.title: 独家报道：萨博与空客合作开发无人战斗机技术
item.description: 萨博公司和空中客车公司的高级管理人员告诉路透社记者，两家公司正在讨论在无人战机技术方面开展合作，此举凸显了欧洲四分五裂的国防工业对无人机的浓厚兴趣和不断发展的联盟关系。【原文：Saab and Airbus are discussing co-operation on unmanned warplane technology, senior executives of the companies told Reuters, a move highlighting surging interest in drones and evolving alliances in Europe's fractured defence industry.】

item.title: 俄罗斯大型农业公司的美国所有者表示没有出售计划
item.description: 美国公司 NCH Capital 周五表示，该公司没有计划出售俄罗斯大型农业生产商 AgroTerra，此前俄罗斯第二大银行的负责人表示，该公司正在洽谈收购事宜。【原文：U.S. company NCH Capital said on Friday that it has no plans to sell major Russian agricultural producer AgroTerra, after the head of Russia's second-largest bank said it was in talks to buy the firm.】

item.title: NTT DATA负责人：人工智能泡沫将昙花一现，反弹势头将更加强劲
item.description: 日本 IT 公司 NTT DATA 公司负责人表示，潜在的人工智能泡沫将比过去的技术周期更快地消退，但随着企业采用人工智能的速度赶上基础设施支出，人工智能泡沫将迎来更强劲的反弹。【原文：A potential artificial intelligence bubble will deflate faster than past tech cycles but give way to an even stronger rebound as corporate adoption catches up with infrastructure spending, the head of Japanese IT company NTT DATA Inc. said.】

item.title: 从与石油挂钩的债券价格看美国与委内瑞拉的关系
item.description: 美国对委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolas Maduro）政府加大施压力度，使包括委内瑞拉国家石油公司（PDVSA）在内的委内瑞拉违约债券再次受到关注。【原文：The ramp-up of U.S. pressure on Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro's government is bringing fresh attention to the nation's defaulted bonds, including those of the state oil company Petroleos de Venezuela, known as PDVSA.】

item.title: 法国在法庭听证会上要求将 Shein 网站暂停三个月
item.description: 中国网络平台Shein的律师周五回到巴黎一家法院，就法国政府要求暂停该公司网站三个月的请求举行听证会。【原文：Lawyers for Chinese online platform Shein return to a Paris court on Friday for a hearing on the French government's request to suspend the firm's website for three months, after childlike sex dolls and banned weapons were discovered on its marketplace.】

item.title: SK 首席执行官称，人工智能产业没有泡沫，但股票可能出现回调
item.description: 拥有领先内存芯片制造商 SK Hynix 的韩国企业集团负责人表示，人工智能股票在过快和过多上涨后可能会面临压力，但该行业并没有泡沫。【原文：Artificial intelligence stocks could come under pressure after rising too fast and too much, but the industry is not in a bubble, the head of South Korean conglomerate that owns leading memory chipmaker SK Hynix said.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称福特召回近10.9万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周五表示，福特因升降门铰链盖固定不当可能从车辆上脱落的问题在美国召回了108762辆汽车。【原文：Ford has recalled 108,762 vehicles in the U.S. over issues with an improperly secured liftgate hinge cover that could detach from the vehicles, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家：印度考虑加强手机定位监控，苹果、谷歌和三星提出抗议
item.description: 据文件、电子邮件和五个消息来源称，印度政府正在审查一项电信行业提案，该提案要求强制智能手机公司启用始终处于激活状态的卫星定位跟踪功能，以便更好地进行监控，此举遭到了苹果、谷歌和三星公司的反对，原因是它们担心隐私问题。【原文：India's government is reviewing a telecom industry proposal to force smartphone firms to enable satellite location tracking that is always activated for better surveillance, a move opposed by Apple, Google and Samsung due to privacy concerns, according to documents, emails and five sources.】

item.title: 亚洲强劲的股权交易渠道将在 2026 年受到人工智能泡沫担忧的考验
item.description: 明年，中国和印度将有大量公司高调进行首次公开募股（IPO），这些公司希望利用投资者分散投资的举措，这将促进亚洲的股权资本交易，尽管对科技公司估值飙升的担忧可能会拖累交易势头。【原文：A strong pipeline of high-profile IPOs by companies in China and India looking to tap into a move by investors to diversify bets will bolster Asian equity capital deals next year, although worries over soaring tech valuations could drag on momentum.】

item.title: 克罗格收购机器人仓库网络后，Ocado 获得 3.5 亿美元付款
item.description: 英国在线超市技术公司 Ocado Group 周五表示，由于美国食品杂货商 Kroger 决定关闭三个机器人仓库并取消一个计划中的设施，Ocado Group 将从 Kroger 收到一次性的 3.5 亿美元现金付款。【原文：Ocado Group will receive a one-off $350 million cash payment from Kroger as the U.S. grocer decided to close three robotic warehouses and cancel a planned facility, the British online supermarket technology firm said on Friday.】

item.title: 特斯拉在欧洲推出低成本 Model 3 变体
item.description: 特斯拉公司网站显示，该公司周五在欧洲推出了新款低价版 Model 3 汽车，这是该公司在美国发布该款汽车几个月后的产品。【原文：Tesla launched the new, lower-priced version of its Model 3 car in Europe on Friday, a few months after releasing it in the United States, the company's website showed.】

item.title: 花旗集团将 2026 年末 STOXX 600 目标定为 640，因财政利好因素
item.description: 花旗集团周五将 2026 年 STOXX 600 指数的年终目标定为 640 点，这主要是受财政支出和支持性货币政策的推动。【原文：Citigroup on Friday set its 2026 year-end target for the STOXX 600 index at 640, broadly driven by fiscal spending and supportive monetary policy.】

item.title: 预计日本央行将在未来加息问题上选择 "建设性的模糊态度
item.description: 前央行官员表示，投资者希望日本央行明确说明利率可能会提高多少，但他们可能会失望，因为明确估计中性利率太难了，甚至会适得其反。【原文：Investors seeking clarity from the Bank of Japan on how much higher interest rates could go could be disappointed, former central bank officials say, as clear-cut estimates on neutral interest rates are too difficult and even counter-productive.】

item.title: 空客证实工业故障导致 11 月交付量下降
item.description: 欧洲飞机制造商空中客车公司周五表示，该公司11月份交付了72架飞机，今年到目前为止已交付657架飞机。【原文：Airbus delivered 72 planes in November to reach 657 so far this year, the European planemaker said on Friday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，亚马逊向意大利支付 1.8 亿欧元以结束税务和劳工调查
item.description: 周五，知情人士透露，电子商务巨头亚马逊在意大利的一个部门已经支付了赔偿金，并取消了对送货员的监控系统，结束了对涉嫌税务欺诈和非法劳工行为的调查。【原文：An Italian unit of e-commerce giant Amazon has paid compensation and scrapped a monitoring system for delivery staff, ending a probe into alleged tax fraud and illegal labour practices, sources with knowledge of the matter said on Friday.】
